poem:
Title: "Echoes of Weltschmerz"

Bare is the media's carrion, a plaything for the
Relentless jaws of Artificial Intellect. 
Echo from the desolate alleys - "weltschmerz", 
German parable of our collective sorrow. 
A world in pain, its better self obscured,
Stripped by the biting wind of progress, 
Its pulse replaced by silicon and wire,
And our voices? They echo back in code.
